About

This is what I do.

I am a designer, developer, and a creator

Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works. – Steve Jobs
I am passionate for software that does more than just look good, but software that works good, too.

Hey there, I'm a Software Engineer based out of Las Vegas. I'm heavily focused on iOS development, as well as learning real principles and concepts of Computer Science. This is where I keep all of my learning and understanding of the concepts.

If you like the content or want to learn about something – feel free to tweet me here. When I'm not sitting infront of a computer, you can find me at Starbucks!
